name: Vertical Wand Climbing Ninja Jump FREE
name_original: Vertical Wand Climbing Ninja Jump FREE
description:
This is a fast paced action game with a simple but unique game play. Have your ninja run vertically up the walls and change from left to right to jump over the obstacles as they come down the walls.

You can destroy the obstacles if you jump on top of it. How long can you go?

Features:
-Very addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn but very hard to master
-Cool sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
